### Deployments & Changes
- Monthly evidence bundle validation completed.
- Token rotation campaign: 18/22 rotated; remaining scheduled.
- Performed audit DB vacuum/analyze; replication lag under 0.5s.

- Updated 2 RBAC policies, 124 role grants, 132 revokes, 42 permission change requests; SLA p50: 38 min.
- Conducted 24 directory syncs; 620 objects updated, 6 deleted, no failures; avg duration 62s.
- Checked 7 SOX controls, 12 SOC2 controls; 1 exception closed.
- Verified IDP health: 8 SAML assertion errors, 0 OIDC discovery errors, 0 JWKS fetch errors; 2 metadata refreshes.
- Ran helpdesk: 210 access requests, 132 password resets, 25 MFA resets; median first response 12 min.
- Rate limiting: 23 login, 6 token endpoint throttles; no API key throttling.
- Enforced session security: 35 reauth events, 4 device blocks; 32,740 devices remembered.
- Exported 8 CSV, 3 PDF evidence reports; no failures.
- Pending 26 admin approval requests; 5 auto-approved, 2 rejected; avg approval time 33 min.

### Events
- Weekend closeout: closed one escalated attestation exception after department head review; remaining tracked for next business day.
- Ran monthly evidence bundle validation: confirmed checksums and access controls.
- Reviewed token rotation campaign: 18/22 rotated; scheduled remaining 4.
- Performed audit DB maintenance: vacuum/analyze; replication lag under 0.5s.
